LVIII OF1973 [11th August, 1973] An Act to repeal and, with certain amendments, re-enact the Working Journalists (Conditions of Service) Ordinance, 1960. WHEREAS it is expedient to repeal and, with certain amendments, re-enact the Working Journalists (Conditions of Service) Ordinance, 1960; It is hereby enacted as follows:― 1. Short title, extent and commencement.―(1) This Act may be called the Newspaper Employees (Conditions of Service) Act 1973. (2) It extends to the whole of Pakistan. (3) It shall come into force at once. 2. Definitions.
